Wanda J. (Yeager) Spatz

August 16, 2024

Wanda J. (Yeager) Spatz 1942-2024 SALEM – Wanda J. (Yeager) Spatz, 81, passed away on Thursday, Aug. 15, 2024, at her Salem home. She was born in Erie, Pa. on Oct. 7, 1942, to the late Joseph and Wanda (Gerbracht) Yeager. She married David Harold Spatz of Louisville, Ky., on Dec. 28, ...

Dianna Elaine Rickard

August 16, 2024

Dianna Elaine Rickard 1944-2024 SALEM — Dianna Elaine Rickard, 80, passed away peacefully Tuesday, Aug. 13, 2024. She was born June 20, 1944, in Youngstown, daughter of the late Chester David and Pearl (Myers) Rickard. Dianna graduated from Girard High School in 1962 where she played in ...

Herbert D. Nannah

August 15, 2024

Herbert D. Nannah, 85, of Salem, Ohio, sadly left us on Aug. 13, 2024, peacefully in his home surrounded by his loved ones. He is preceded in death by son Douglas D. Nannah and his wife of 63 years, Judith A. Nannah. He is survived by daughter Cheryl L. Stakleff and granddaughters Jessica ...

Betty Marie Bowser

August 15, 2024

1927-2024 SALEM — Betty Marie Bowser, 96, passed away peacefully on Monday, Aug. 12, 2024, at Auburn Skilled Nursing and Rehabilitation in Salem. Born on Oct. 29, 1927, in Huntingdon, Pa., she was the cherished daughter of Alvin Russler and Olive Carolus. Betty spent her life as a ...

Scott E. Swiger

August 14, 2024

1967-2024 Scott E. Swiger, passed away peacefully on Sunday, August 11, 2024, at the age of 56. Born on August 24, 1967, in Salem, Ohio, Scott was the beloved son of Ira and Mary Ann (Lipp) Swiger. Growing up in the town where he was born, Scott attended South Range High School, where he ...

Clark Dennis Hoopes

August 14, 2024

1953-2024 Clark Dennis Hoopes was born in Salem, Ohio on March 14, 1953, the first child of Glenn and Arlene Hoopes, of Damascus. A graduate of West Branch High School in 1971, he also graduated Cum Laude from Malone College in 1975 with a BA in Math and Business. At Malone he served as ...
